text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1985. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ===1980s=== *Balão Mágico (TV series) (1983-1986) ==Births== *21 April - Paloma Bernardi, actress & dancer *4 July - Mariana Rios, actress, singer- songwriter & TV host ==Deaths== ==See also== *1985 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1985
title: 1985 in Brazilian television
